articles.title: Australia ranks fourth on global property risk list. Will we dodge it? - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Australia is one of the most likely countries in the world to experience property price falls, a new ranking shows, but the drops might not be as deep as priced-out buyers hope.

articles.description: The Australian sharemarket has fallen slightly at open on Friday as falling commodity prices hurt the mining and energy sectors, despite Wall Street posting gains overnight following Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s testimony.

articles.title: Afghanistan's earthquake has left this girl with nothing. Can the West help her without funding the Taliban? - ABC News
articles.description: A magnitude-6.1 earthquake in remote Afghanistan exacerbates a tricky ethical dilemma for Australia and other like-minded nations: How can they help Afghan people dealing with yet another unimaginable situation without supporting the Taliban directly?

A young girl sits in front of a pile of rubble that used to be her house. Her entire family is buried under there.
